item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 29 Mar 2022
item.description:
1. pyml_bindgen: a CLI app to generate Python bindings directly from OCaml value specifications
  2. Tarides is hiring!
  3. For Diversity and the OCaml Community: Outreachy Summer 2022
  4. Caqti 1.8.0 and related news
  5. First release of prbnmcn-dagger
  6. MirageOS 4.0
  7. OCaml 4.14.0 is released
  8. ocaml-in-python.0.1.0: Effortless Python bindings for OCaml modules
